column1: maria del carmen vazquez| add a memorial maria del carmen vazquez cruz of mc. kinney
column3: 2015 at the age of 23. she was born january 14
column4: 1992 to eloy vazquez and ma del carmen (cruz) vazquez in celaya guanajuato
column5: mexico. in 2001 she moved to the dallas area and attended mc. kinney high school. she enjoyed watching scary movies and had a great love for ice cream. maria was at her happiest when she was drawing. her family will always remember the rock collection she kept in her shoes. she is survived by her parents
column6: eloy and carmen vazquez of mc. kinney
column8: edgar vazquez and oscar vazquez also of mc. kinney; grandparents
column9: pedro vazquez and graciela jauregui of mexico; numerous aunts
column10: uncles and cousins. maria was preceded in death by her grandparents
column11: maria lopez and isidro cruz. a funeral mass will be held 11:00 a. m.
column14: 2015 at st. michae'ls catholic church in mc. kinney
column15: texas. interment will follow the service at ridgeview memorial park in allen
column16: texas. the family will receive friends during a visitation on sunday evening from 7:00 p. m. to 9:00 p. m. at turrentine-jackson-morrow funeral home in allen
column17: texas. a rosary will begin at 7:00 p. m. memorials
